It seems like a local event router would be a good thing to have. This would forward events to KNS and send out directives to local systems.
Wouldn't it be cool if something like your home router could act as a local event router?
Or, say, the CustomCTRL? http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/916146896/customctrl
I might want KRL to fire off different test suites, but the Kynetx servers don't have access to my Jenkins server. The local event router could make that happen.
